H0.text: Which cheese shares its name with a Guiness Premiership rugby team that play at Welford Road. Leicester

H1.text: Which cheese shares its name with a Guiness Premiership rugby team that play at Welford Road. Stilton

H2.text: Which cheese shares its name with a Guiness Premiership rugby team that play at Welford Road. Cheddar

H3.text: Which cheese shares its name with a Guiness Premiership rugby team that play at Welford Road. Caerlyr

A4.text: Red Leicester is also known simply as Leicester.
